original_text:
CLAUSE 13: A
Risk Level: standard Word Count: 35
ssignment: Borrower shall not assign this Agreement, in whole or in part, without the
written consent of Lender. Lender may assign all or any portion of this Agreement with written
notice to Borrower.
plain_english: This termination requires compliance with specific requirements.
user_impact: You must follow these low-risk requirements or face consequences.
